newsitem.title: UK: Cazenove Indian GDR Index down 0.31 percent.
newsitem.headline: Cazenove Indian GDR Index down 0.31 percent.

text.p: The Cazenove Indian GDR Index fell 0.24 points, or 0.31 percent, to 76.27 points after the Bombay Stock Exchange 30 share index fell 61.30 points to 3,352.71.
The premium for GDRs over stocks on the local market was 11.33 percent.
The Cazenove index is a capitalisation weighted basket of Indian global depositary receipts and measures the change from midday on the previous trading day to midday today.
